SELECT METER.MDS_ID AS meterId , MAX(BILL.YYYYMMDD) as "date" , BILL.ACCUMULATEUSAGE as usage , 'kWh' as usageUnit , BILL.ACCUMULATEBILL as balance , 'GHC' as creditUnit FROM CONTRACT CONT LEFT OUTER JOIN CUSTOMER CUST ON CONT.CUSTOMER_ID = CUST.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN METER METER ON CONT.METER_ID = METER.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BILLING_BLOCK_TARIFF BILL ON BILL.METER_ID = METER.ID
GROUP BY METER.MDS_ID , BILL.ACCUMULATEUSAGE , BILL.ACCUMULATEBILL

SELECT meter.MDS_ID AS meterId , bill.YYYYMMDD as "date" , bill.ACCUMULATEUSAGE as usage , 'kWh' as usageUnit , bill.ACCUMULATEBILL as credit , 'GHC' as creditUnit FROM CONTRACT CONT LEFT OUTER JOIN CUSTOMER CUST ON CONT.CUSTOMER_ID = CUST.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN METER METER ON CONT.METER_ID = METER.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BILLING_BLOCK_TARIFF BILL ON BILL.METER_ID = METER.ID

SELECT meter.MDS_ID AS meterId , monthly.YYYYMM as responseDateTime , monthly.USED_CONSUMPTION as usage , 'kWh' as usageUnit , monthly.MONTHLY_COST as credit , 'GHC' as creditUnit FROM CONTRACT CONT LEFT OUTER JOIN METER METER ON CONT.METER_ID = METER.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MONTHLY_BILLING_LOG MONTHLY ON MONTHLY.CONTRACT_ID = CONT.ID
